input: Which one among the following is a Fundamental Duties of citizens under the Constitution of India?

options.A: To provide friendly cooperation to the people of the neighbouring countries
options.B: To visit the monuments of national importance
options.C: To defend the country and render national service when called upon to do so
options.D: To know more and more about the religions of India

explanation: One of the fundamental duties is to “defend the country and render national service when called upon to do so.”
